name: Christmas Jam
description:
Work in progress... Context

Student game jam for the french college: ;IIM.

Its is a little chase/survival game, made in 3 day with the theme "Santa Claus is a scumbag"

PITCH

A child wants to meet Santa Claus but finds himself face to face with a monster and must escape from his house to survive. Asymmetric multiplayer game where you play either the monster or the child trying to escape.

PRODUCER : Pierre Arvis

GAME DESIGNER : William Filipe, Siméon Arthaud, Arthur Parmentier

PROGRAMMERS: Téo Martin, Raphael Da Costa, Thomas Kang

ARTISTS: Pauline Roy, Inès Ouhmani
